TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignSurfaceManager extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IServiceProvider
Public Class DesignSurfaceManager Implements IDisposable, IServiceProvider
public ref class DesignSurfaceManager : IDisposable, IServiceProvider
type DesignSurfaceManager = class interface IServiceProvider interface IDisposable

span.span: Manages a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类旨在成为 对象的容器。The class is designed to be a container of objects. 它提供处理设计器、属性窗口和其他全局对象之间的事件路由的通用服务。It provides common services that handle event routing between designers, property windows, and other global objects. 如果使用 ，则是可选的，但是如果您希望拥有多个设计器窗口，则建议使用。Using is optional, but it is recommended if you intend to have several designer windows. 类自动提供若干设计时服务。The class provides several design-time services automatically. 您可以通过在 "受保护的 " 属性中替换这些服务来覆盖每个服务。You can override each of these services by replacing them in the protected property. 若要替换服务，请重写构造函数、调用基，并通过 protected 属性进行任何更改。To replace a service, override the constructor, call base, and make any changes through the protected property. 当处理设计图面管理器时，将释放添加到服务容器中并实现 接口的所有服务。All services added to the service container that implement the interface are disposed when the design surface manager is disposed. 类提供作为默认服务的 接口。The class provides the interface as the default service. 提供设计器事件的全局事件处理机制。 provides a global eventing mechanism for designer events. 利用这种机制，在设计器变为活动状态时，应用程序会得到通知。With this mechanism, an application is informed when a designer becomes active. 该服务提供设计器集合和单个位置，全局对象（如属性窗口）可监视选择更改事件。The service provides a collection of designers and a single place where global objects, such as the Properties window, can monitor selection change events.

permission.span: 用于完全访问系统资源。

span.span: for full access to system resources.
Demand values: , .
Associated state:

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Property ActiveDesignSurface As DesignSurface

public: virtual property System::ComponentModel::Design::DesignSurface ^ ActiveDesignSurface { System::ComponentModel::Design::DesignSurface ^ get(); void set(System::ComponentModel::Design::DesignSurface ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置活动设计器。

span.span: Gets or sets the active designer.
The active designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当设计器成为活动窗口时，设计器的用户界面都应该设置 属性。The property should be set by the designer's user interface whenever a designer becomes the active window. 此属性的默认实现与 接口的默认实现一起使用，通知感兴趣方现在新设计器已处于活动状态。The default implementation of this property works with the default implementation of the interface to notify interested parties that a new designer is now active. 如果您提供自己的 实现，则应重写此属性，以相应地通知您的服务。If you provide your own implementation of , you should override this property to notify your service appropriately. 此属性可设置为 `null`，指示没有任何设计器处于活动状态。This property can be set to `null`, indicating that no designer is active.

Creates an instance of a design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface CreateDesignSurface(class System.IServiceProvider parentProvider) cil managed
Public Function CreateDesignSurface (parentProvider As IServiceProvider) As DesignSurface

param.name: parentProvider

span.span: A parent service provider.

param.span: 将创建一个新的合并服务提供程序，它将首先向此提供程序请求一个服务，然后将任何失败委托给设计图面管理器对象。

span.span: A new merged service provider will be created that will first ask this provider for a service, and then delegate any failures to the design surface manager object.

param.span: 此合并提供程序将被传递到 方法中。

span.span: This merged provider will be passed into the method.
Creates an instance of a design surface.
A new design surface instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要方便地添加其他每个设计器服务，请使用 `parentProvider` 参数为此设计图面提供服务提供程序。If you want to conveniently add additional per-designer services, use the `parentProvider` parameter to provide a service provider for this design surface. 方法创建一个合并服务提供程序，该提供程序可满足来自给定服务提供商和 本身的服务请求。The method creates a merged service provider that can satisfy service requests from both the given service provider as well as the itself. 然后 方法将此服务提供程序传递到 方法中。The method then passes this service provider into the method. 返回设计图面后， 方法尝试获取 。After returns the design surface, the method tries to obtain the . 如果它存在，并且它是 默认提供的服务的实例，则 方法将引发 事件。If it is present, and if it is the instance of the service that provided by default, the method raises the event.

span.span: is .

para.span: 如果提供了服务的外部实现，则从 类派生的类负责引发 事件。

span.span: If an external implementation of the service was provided, it is the responsibility of the class that derives from the class to raise the event.

A new design surface instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这两个 方法都调用 方法。The method is called by both methods. 它是实际创建设计图面的实现。It is the implementation that actually creates the design surface. 默认实现只返回一个新的 。The default implementation just returns a new . 您可以重写此方法以提供从 类派生的自定义对象。You may override this method to provide a custom object that derives from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是在 的顶层直接实现的，因此，如果您提供该服务的自己的实现，则此属性将使用您的实现。The property is implemented directly on top of , so if you provide your own implementation of that service, this property uses your implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Public 方法遵循标准 模式。The public method follows the standard pattern. 调用此方法会销毁设计图面管理器。Calling this method destroys the design surface manager. 它还会释放服务容器，这会导致同时释放实现 的所有服务。It also disposes the service container, which causes all services that implement to also be disposed. 此方法的受保护版本是 `virtual` 的，并遵循正常的 模式。The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal pattern. > [!NOTE] > 由于 没有任何要清理的本机代码，因此它没有调用 的终结器。Because does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls . 如果需要调用 ，则必须自行添加终结器。If you need to call , you must add a finalizer yourself.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Public 方法遵循标准 模式。The public method follows the standard pattern. 调用此方法会销毁设计图面管理器。Calling this method destroys the design surface manager. 它还会释放服务容器，这会导致同时释放实现 的所有服务。It also disposes the service container, which causes all services that implement to also be disposed. 此方法的受保护版本是 `virtual` 的，并遵循正常的 模式。The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal pattern. > [!NOTE] > 由于 没有任何要清理的本机代码，因此它没有调用 的终结器。Because does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls . 如果需要调用 ，则必须自行添加终结器。If you need to call , you must add a finalizer yourself. 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 如果 `disposing` 参数为 true，则此方法将释放此 引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法转发到在构造时提供给设计图面管理器的任何服务提供程序。The method forwards to any service provider that was given to the design surface manager at construction time.
